description: A PHP web page implementing the 'Reset / Restore Gateway' user interface with associated client-side JavaScript to handle reset and restore actions via AJAX calls.

methods.name: setResetInfo
methods.description: Initiates a reset or restore action based on the provided info array by sending an AJAX request to perform the operation and handling UI updates accordingly.

methods.name: checkForRebooting
methods.description: Checks if the device has rebooted by polling the index.php page and redirects to login upon success.
